s0182: He let horses run free on the southern slopes of Mount Hua, released oxen in the wilderness of Taolin;
s0183: Laid down weapons and spears, rested the troops and dismissed the armies: showing the world they would not be used again.
s0184: King Wu had already conquered Yin, two years later asked Jizi why Yin perished.
s0185: Jizi could not bear to speak of Yin's evils, so spoke of the principles for preserving and destroying states.
s0186: King Wu also considered it shameful, so asked about the Way of Heaven.
s0187: King Wu died in the twelfth year, King Cheng ascended.
s0188: King Cheng was young, the Duke of Zhou acted as regent.
s0189: The three guards rebelled, the Duke of Zhou put down the rebellion.
s0190: He moved the Yin people to Luo, established the eastern capital.
s0191: He made the Shao Proclamation, established the ritual system.
s0192: He made the Luo Proclamation, established the well-field system.
s0193: He made the Jun Shi Proclamation, divided the lands.
s0194: He made the wine prohibition proclamation, banned drunkenness.
s0195: King Cheng grew up, the Duke of Zhou returned the government.
s0196: King Cheng was diligent in government, the world was at peace.
s0197: King Cheng died, King Kang ascended.
s0198: King Kang monitored the eastern regions, toured the lords, administered justice.
s0199: Forty years without punishment, the world was at peace under King Kang.
s0200: King Kang died, King Zhao ascended.
s0201: King Zhao went south to tour, died at the Han River.
s0203: King Mu was ambitious and fond of grandeur, personally drove eight horses.
s0204: He went west to attack the Quanrong, obtained four white wolves and four white deer.
s0205: He made Zhao Ju the Grand Master, prepared to attack the Quanrong.
s0206: The Quanrong submitted, King Mu stopped.
s0207: He toured the north, reached the Great Wall.
s0208: He saw the Yellow Emperor's Xuanyuan Terrace.
s0209: He returned and died at Haojing.
s0210: King Mu's son King Gong ascended.
s0211: King Gong died, his younger brother King Yi ascended.
s0212: King Yi died, King Xiao ascended.
s0213: King Xiao died, King Li ascended.
s0214: King Li was tyrannical, the common people rebelled.
s0215: King Li fled to Zhi, died there.
s0216: The common people made Duke Wu of Gonghe regent.
s0217: Fourteen years, King Xuan ascended, the Gonghe administration ended.
s0218: King Xuan revived Zhou's prosperity, moved the capital to Luoyi.
s0219: He attacked the Quanrong, drove them out.
s0220: He attacked the Jiang, defeated them.
s0221: He attacked the Xu Yan, captured their king.
s0222: Two younger brothers of the same mother, Yi Zhongyan, gave birth to Gongsun Wuzhi.
s0223: 19. The duke died and commanded to establish younger brother He as Duke Mu.
s0224: Duke Mu of Qin, first year.
s0226: Quwo Wu Gong killed Xiao Zi.
s0227: Zhou attacked Quwo, established Duke Ai of Jin's younger brother Min as Duke of Jin.
s0228: Duke Min of Jin, first year.
s0229: Duke Huan of Song, Yu Yue, first year.
s0231: Xi Fu Ren, a woman from Chen, passed through Cai, Cai did not show courtesy, hated her.
